data.title: Kirarin Revolution Idol Mascot: 1Box (10pcs)
data.meta_description: The three lovely Milky Way idols and three adorable cats from Kirarin Revolution are now offered as these sweet keychain figures! This gashapon lineup features Cobeni, Kirari, Noel, Mii-chan, Naa-san, and Nii-kun, for a total of six possible types to trade and collect. A character sticker is included with each cat strap figure. Sold by the randomly packed box of 10. Please note that these are gashapon figures, and are individually sealed in their plastic eggs and randomly packed into boxes of 10. As a result we are unable to honor requests for individual or specific figures, nor can we promise you which one(s) you will receive in a box. Please order only if you are willing to accept any of the possible types.
data.text:
by Yujin

â‚¬14.58 EUR

This item is discontinued and is not expected to come back into stock.

Description

This is a series of gashapon (capsule toys) or trading figures depicting characters or people.

The three lovely Milky Way idols and three adorable cats from "Kirarin Revolution" are now offered as these sweet keychain figures! This gashapon lineup features Cobeni, Kirari, Noel, Mii-chan, Naa-san, and Nii-kun, for a total of six possible types to trade and collect. A character sticker is included with each cat strap figure. Sold by the randomly packed box of 10. Please note that these are gashapon figures, and are individually sealed in their plastic "eggs" and randomly packed into boxes of 10. As a result we are unable to honor requests for individual or specific figures, nor can we promise you which one(s) you will receive in a box. Please order only if you are willing to accept any of the possible types.
